name: Nango
headline: A single API for all your integrations
description:
Customers expect your SaaS to integrate with all the software they use.

With Nango, you ship integrations your customers love, fast.

Leverage hundreds of pre-built integrations and unlimited customization.

founders.name: Robin Guldener, Founder
founders.description:
Founded Nango after seeing first hand how hard it to build product integrations between SaaS.
Previously co-founded Avrios, a B2B SaaS for car fleet management, and grew it to 1000+ customers.

founders.name: Bastien Beurier, Founder
founders.description: French & American. Grew up in Paris and worked in San Francisco. Recidivist founder (2 x YC). Previously senior platform engineer at Uber. Also worked at Lantern, Trip.com, Triplebyte.

# The most comprehensive product integrations platform
Ship the integrations your customers need with 300+ APIs.Code-first, fully customizable & low maintenance.
[Get startedGet started](https://nango.dev/<https:/app.nango.dev/>)[Talk to an expert](https://nango.dev/<#>)
[Introducing Free OAuth for 300+ APIs](https://nango.dev/</auth>)
## Integrate once, unlock many integrations
[Watch 2-min product demoWatch 2-min product demo](https://nango.dev/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/679cb5a06ae72c74fcc6a31e_integrations-img.png)
Backed by
![Y combinator](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/63c3886f8ffd31d022626ab8_ycombinator-ar21.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/673790eb5d525741c469bc0e_cover.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/679cb4ad0da7068031b7f42a_integrations-background.jpg)
Pre-built use cases
## Ship integrations with 300+ APIs in hours
Abstract away API specificities with pre-built integrations, developer tooling and UI components.
[Discover all APIsDiscover all APIs](https://nango.dev/</api-integrations>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/67827f0d998a93a9d52a5b30_ship-integrations.png)
### Pre-built integrations
Hundreds of popular use-cases to integrate out-of-the-box.
### Authorization handling
Built-in support for all authorization types & quirks.
### Unified API & models
A single interface with your own data models.
### UI components
Seamless UIs for best-in-class integration experiences.
### API-specific tooling
Developer tools configured per API: pagination, rate-limits, etc.
### AI co-pilot
Build custom with an AI trained on hundreds of integrations.
### API experts on demand
Consult Nango experts on enterprise APIs.
### Integrations service
Nango engineers build custom integrations for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/67828b5bfa3bee47bbfba52c_glows.png)
Powerful developer experience
## As flexible as building in-house, without the hassle
Build exactly the integrations your customers need, as if you were building in-house.
[Read the docs](https://nango.dev/<https:/docs.nango.dev>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/6782acc8df1c845fbc89d3e7_Illustration%203%20\(1\).png)
### Integrations as code
Full control over the code and full access to the external APIs.
### Customer-specific configs
Tailor integrations per customer without duplicating code.
### Two-way data sync
Keep your app and APIs in sync, both upstream and downstream.
### Real-time webhooks
Process external webhooks at scale and in real-time.
### White label
Deliver integrations under your brand and design.
### No lock-in
Access to API credentials and code, if you want to migrate off.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/6782acc83eefa6a63833c8cf_Illustration%204%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/676d7e02192159b2a0777855_DOTS.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/6782a4721b556ea05c9cff10_Ellipse%203.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/678287b897d7089a662a38c6_Frame%201707478805.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/678287b8e9bf82af78847595_Frame%201707478803.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/678287b87be1a6e43904c6b9_Frame%201707478804.png)
Scalable infrastructure
## Everything you need for reliable integrations
We’ve built best-in-class integration infrastructure that scales so you don’t have to.
[Read the docs](https://nango.dev/<https:/docs.nango.dev>)
### Real-time observability
Logs, metrics and alerts purpose built for integrations.
### Type safety & data quality
Data quality as first-class-citizen for every integration.
### Durable execution
Queuing & retries on auto-pilot for your integration executions.
### Invalid credential detection
Detect revoked credentials, so integrations always run smoothly.
### Environments & versioning
Version-control, run locally & deploy to cloud environments.
### Unit testing
Leverage a testing framework is purpose-built for integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63c092e946f9b71ff6874169/676d7e02192159b2a0777855_DOTS.png)
Private & Secure
## Designed for maximum privacy & security
Gain full control over the data you sync, with enterprise-grade security, compliance, and transparency.
### Only the data you need
Control the data and endpoint you consume from external API.
### Strong encryption
Protect against unauthorized access with data encryption, at rest and in transit.
### Granular scopes & permissions
Control the scopes & permissions you are requesting from external APIs.
### SOC 2 Type II & GDPR
Dedicated to the highest security standards of data protection & privacy.
### Enterprise SSO & Audit Logs
Support for 20+ identity providers, inspect integrations usage & traffic.
### Open Source & Self Hostable
Join 2,000+ users, access the code, contribute, and host Nango.
Instructions
To edit this component you must:
  1. Add the z-index-3 class to the layout417_card card-[number]. This makes it possible to see and edit a specific card.
  2. Make sure you delete the z-index-3 when you finish.

Don’t take our word for it, hear it from them.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cb480c27e7bc98c7ec69cf/675841fed3ec2a146fd0d309_Lago.svg)How Lago transformed their billing integrations with Nango](https://nango.dev/</customers/lago>)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63cb480c27e7bc98c7ec69cf/679fb85145ca11634c37d8b9_lago-bg.png)

generated_description:
**Nango**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from the Y Combinator Batch W23, Nango positions itself as a game-changer in the SaaS landscape. Based in San Francisco and driven by a compact team of six, Nango's mission is clear: to provide a single API that simplifies all your integration needs.

**The Problem**: Customers expect seamless integration with multiple software solutions when using a SaaS product. Traditional integration approaches can be tedious, time-consuming, and frustrating.

**The Solution**: Nango offers over 300 pre-built integrations that allow businesses to ship the integrations their customers crave, quickly and efficiently. By abstracting API specifics, Nango empowers developers to customize integrations at scale without the usual hassle. This means you can focus on building incredible features rather than getting bogged down with the intricacies of API management.

**Key Features**:
- **Flexibility**: Think of it as building integrations in-house without the overhead. With support for various authorization types, unified API models, and developer-specific tooling, Nango makes it easy to customize integrations for different customer needs.
- **Developer Experience**: Nango offers powerful options such as two-way data synchronization, real-time webhooks, and even an AI co-pilot to assist in creating custom integrations. And it doesn't stop there—you have full control over the underlying code, meaning no lock-in with Nango's services.
- **Security and Privacy**: Nango prioritizes data protection with SOC 2 Type II and GDPR compliance, detailed permission controls, and strong encryption. Your customers can trust that their data is secure.

**Customer Testimonials**: Real stories from existing customers showcase how Nango has transformed their integration processes, accelerating their growth and enabling better service delivery.

If you're in the developer-tools, SaaS, or open-source spaces and want to enhance your integration strategies, taking a closer look at Nango's offerings could be worthwhile.

For more details and to explore their documentation, visit [Nango’s website](https://nango.dev). 

Nango is not just about streamlining integrations—it's about empowering developers to unlock the full potential of software collaboration, swiftly and securely.
